author: Staff Reporter
text:
The district police here have arrested Shiyaz from Malappuram in Kerala at the Pollachi Bus Stand on Sunday after he was reportedly caught with about 1.5 kg ganja in a bag.

The police said that they checked the man based on a tip off.

It was learnt that he bought the contraband substance from Palani and was taking it to Kerala.

He was booked under the NDPS Act and remanded, sources said.
title: Arrested for smuggling ganja
